RelatedSentence: The deputy head of research at the Ministry of Education says the ministry is looking at incorporating the Citizens ' Rights Charter into school texts for the coming academic year .

The deputy head of research at the Ministry of Education says the ministry is looking at incorporating the Citizens ' Rights Charter into school texts for the coming academic year .
ISNA quotes Bahram Mohammadian as saying there will be changes in school texts in the elementary grades and the Citizens ' Rights Charter will be incorporated into sociology studies .

Iranian President Hassan Rohani had said at the beginning of the school year that students have to know how to defend their rights and protest against any violations .

I believe the right to protest is where human dignity begins to flourish and it must begin in our schools , Rohani was quoted as saying .
On the 100th day of his presidency , Rohani published a first draft of a Citizens ' Rights Charter and invited public input on ways to improve it .
